tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_sensor_data (
sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
sensor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
sensor_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
sensor_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_sensor_data (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id UUID,
    sensor_type VARCHAR,
    reading DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_data (
    block_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id UUID,
    hash VARCHAR,
    prev_hash VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalData (
    entry_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT NOT NULL,
    data_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_sensor_data (
    sensor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_blockchain_mapping (
    mapping_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT NOT NULL,
    block_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES environmental_sensor_data(sensor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (block_id) REFERENCES blockchain_network(block_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_verification (
    verification_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    practice_id INT NOT NULL,
    block_id INT NOT NULL,
    is_verified BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    verification_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (practice_id) REFERENCES sustainability_practices(practice_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (block_id) REFERENCES blockchain_network(block_id)
);
